attributes.action: Make driving tests continue through 2nd lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Allow 1 to 1 lessons to continue, if people are allowed to work sat at desks without masks, continue to go to school and use public transport they should be able to have the opportunity to pass their tests which will enable them to free up space on transport
attributes.background: Driving is an essential part of people’s lives and a big contributor to the welfare for people in the country, lots of people have worked hard to get up to a standard of driving that has been deemed acceptable for the roads and should be able to keep their test date before their theory expires.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
